ai-patthana21.12:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.12:0.3_0: Talking on the coverings, etc., are skilled in the robes,
ai-patthana21.12:1.1_0: Not for the sake of another, or for the skillful, unskillful qualities arises dependent on the unskillful.
ai-patthana21.12:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.12:7.1_0: Neither deceitfulness arises in someone who is unskillful, with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.12:9.1_0: without hindrances, unskillful qualities arise because of excessiveness.
